--- select_singer_with_limit_and_skiprows.sql
SELECT
  *
FROM
  Singers
LIMIT 100
OFFSET 10

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.Star{
        pos: 9,
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   11,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      18,
            end:      25,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  25,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint:       (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:         (*parser.AsAlias)(nil),
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   &parser.Limit{
      pos:   26,
      Count: &parser.IntLiteral{
        pos:   32,
        end:   35,
        Value: "100",
      },
      Offset: &parser.Offset{
        pos:   36,
        Value: &parser.IntLiteral{
          pos:   43,
          end:   45,
          Value: "10",
        },
      },
    },
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT * FROM Singers LIMIT 100 OFFSET 10
